explanation: [0-0] In a warehouse area, a person wearing white clothing and a white headscarf stands facing the warehouse, holding an assault rifle in both hands. Above them is a scoreboard with a blue background and white number 20 on the left and a red background and white number 30 on the right. Below the scoreboard is a logo displaying the matchup information between the two teams. On the left is a team name with a green shield; in the middle is a pink gun barrel pointing to the right; on the right is a shield with red, yellow, and green colors, followed by the team name. The center of the icon displays the white text "Ziel: 40, 07:01". In the lower right corner are two gun images, each with the number 20/60. To the left of the gun images is a red health bar icon. In the background are distant mountains and a grayish-white sky.

[0-4] The person in white clothing runs forward while swaying left and right, with constant gunfire flying by. The team matchup information above disappears, and a red aiming icon appears in the middle of the screen. Red smoke appears on the right side of the screen as the person in white falls to the ground. The camera zooms in on the doorway of a shipping container where a person in white clothing, a white helmet, and clown makeup is crouching, aiming a gun forward. Yellow light shoots from the gun muzzle to the left. The team matchup information appears above, with the blue number on the scoreboard changing to 31 and the time between scores decreasing. The person with clown makeup stands up, moving while taking out a magazine with their left hand.

The team matchup information above disappears, and a red aiming icon appears in the middle of the screen. Red smoke appears on the right side of the screen as the person in white falls to the ground. [4-7] The screen then turns black, and a pair of eyes slowly opens in the center. The left eye is red, and the right eye is purple. The white English caption "Revenge Time..." appears above, and then the eyes slowly close again.

[4-7] The screen then turns black, and a pair of eyes slowly opens in the center. The left eye is red, and the right eye is purple. The white English caption "Revenge Time..." appears above, and then the eyes slowly close again.

[4-7] The screen then turns black, and a pair of eyes slowly opens in the center. The left eye is red, and the right eye is purple. The white English caption "Revenge Time..." appears above, and then the eyes slowly close again.

[7-11] The scene then changes to show an orange circle in the middle of the screen with a countdown timer. Below the orange circle is a line of white German text, and below that is a light green sign that reads "Ausstattung." In front of a gray-white wall, the person in white clothing runs to the right, holding a gun in both hands. A person in white shorts and a camouflage helmet hides at the corner of the wall. The person in white continues running to the right, and a person in red clothing appears above. An aiming reticle appears in the middle of the screen. The two teams' matchup information above constantly changes and moves upwards, then cuts to the gun's scope. Empty bullet casings continuously fly out from the right side of the scope. The person in red clothing lies on the ground inside the scope, red smoke emanating from their body. Another person in red clothing falls to the ground inside the scope. The camera pans out as several emblem patterns change consecutively at the top of the screen. The number in the orange circle changes from 4 to 1, and the red number on the scoreboard changes to 31. A light green sign with a gun in the middle appears at the bottom of the screen, and the orange "14 Kills" changes to "15 Kills".

[11-18] Finally, the person in white clothing runs to the left, and the orange countdown circle and light green sign disappear. A person in black clothing appears beside a shipping container in the center. The person in white aims their gun at the person in black. The scene switches to the gun's scope. The person in black is lying on the ground in the scope, red smoke emanating from their body. A person in purple clothing flashes on the left, running towards the person in black while holding a gun in both hands. The blue number on the scoreboard changes to 24. The screen moves to the right as the person in white clothing runs to the wooden planks in front of the shipping container and then runs up the planks to the top of the container. The light green sign and orange "16 Kills" below disappear. The screen continues moving to the right as the person in white jumps from the top of one shipping container to the top of another. The scene freezes.
